WorkItem.Description: I have a workbook with named references, for example sheet1!A1 is called protocol_proceedure. I am using Excel5 to read this workbook which passess successfully but when it comes to writing the formula back this ->_func() goes into endless loop. The formula I am using is a simple formula =IF(protocol_proceedure="road",protocol_road,0). If I replace these named references to the sheet-cell reference it works fine and the tokeniser returns the right tokens back, however what i am getting is endless loop causing Apache to crash. Any ideas?

Comments.Message:
This is unfortunately a known bug, Excel5 writer does not support defined names like 'protocol_road' in that IF formula.

Please check this work item:
"Advanced formulas not working with PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5"
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=7895
